mapper.insert: insert into review (reviewNo,placeName,id,reviewTitle,reviewContents,reviewAppraisal,reviewMemberType,serviceScore,tasteScore,moodScore,writeDate) values ((select NVL(MAX(reviewNo),0)+1 FROM review),#{placeName},#{id},#{reviewTitle},#{reviewContents},#{reviewAppraisal},#{reviewMemberType},#{serviceScore},#{tasteScore},#{moodScore},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT placeName,placeAddr,outLine,tel,to_char(writeDate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')writeDate FROM place ORDER BY writeDate desc) where placeName=#{placeName} and ROWNUM =1
SELECT reviewContents FROM (SELECT placeName,reviewContents,to_char(writeDate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')writeDate FROM review ORDER BY writeDate desc) where placeName=#{placeName} and ROWNUM =1
select round(avg(reviewAppraisal),0) from review where placeName = #{placeName}
select placeName,writeDate from( select placeName,to_char(writeDate , 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')writeDate,rownum ,id from review order by writeDate desc ) where id=#{id} and rownum < 13
select * from review where placeName=#{placeName} and id=#{id}
